mapper.select: SELECT b.title, b.user_id, b.mod_id, b.content, b.img_link, TO_CHAR(b.reg_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_dt_formatted, TO_CHAR(b.mod_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS mod_dt_formatted, b.views, b.gname FROM d_board b INNER JOIN d_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
